question: Which country is hosting the 3rd edition of World Conference on Environment?
explanation: The 3rd edition  of ‘World Conference on Environment’ has been organized by the National Green Tribunal (NGT) in New Delhi on March 25, 2017. It was inaugurated  by the honorable President of India Pranab Mukherjee. The 2-day conference will discuss various issues like air pollution, water pollution, economics and clean technology, and the role of courts and tribunals. The sessions of the conference will  deliberate — to what extent can we allow environmental degradation; what are we going to leave behind for future generation; what steps can be taken to curb the perils of environmental degradation; and can we completely squander the assets received from forefathers without leaving anything for our future.
